breakfast_001.title: Masala Oats with Vegetables
breakfast_001.description: Nutritious oats cooked with Indian spices, mixed vegetables, and herbs. A perfect blend of fiber and protein to start your day. Significance: High in beta-glucan fiber which helps lower cholesterol, provides sustained energy, and supports digestive health.
breakfast_001.cooking_method: Sauté vegetables with spices, add oats and water, cook until creamy

breakfast_002.title: Moong Dal Chilla with Mint Chutney
breakfast_002.description: Protein-rich pancakes made from yellow lentils, served with fresh mint chutney. Packed with plant-based protein and essential amino acids. Significance: Excellent source of folate and protein, supports muscle building and provides sustained energy without blood sugar spikes.
breakfast_002.cooking_method: Soak dal overnight, grind to batter, add spices, cook like pancakes

breakfast_003.title: Quinoa Upma with Vegetables
breakfast_003.description: South Indian style upma made with protein-rich quinoa instead of semolina, loaded with colorful vegetables. Significance: Complete protein source with all essential amino acids, gluten-free alternative that supports muscle building and weight management.
breakfast_003.cooking_method: Roast quinoa, sauté spices and vegetables, add quinoa and water, cook until fluffy

breakfast_004.title: Spinach and Paneer Paratha
breakfast_004.description: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with spinach and cottage cheese, rich in iron and calcium. Significance: High in iron from spinach and calcium from paneer, supports bone health and prevents anemia, provides sustained energy.
breakfast_004.cooking_method: Make dough, prepare filling, stuff and roll parathas, cook on griddle with minimal oil

breakfast_005.title: Ragi Dosa with Coconut Chutney
breakfast_005.description: Fermented crepe made from finger millet flour, served with coconut chutney. Rich in calcium and fiber. Significance: Finger millet is a superfood rich in calcium, iron, and amino acids, supports bone health and helps regulate blood sugar.
breakfast_005.cooking_method: Ferment batter overnight, spread thin on griddle, cook until crispy

breakfast_006.title: Egg Bhurji with Multigrain Toast
breakfast_006.description: Scrambled eggs cooked with onions, tomatoes, and Indian spices, served with multigrain bread. Significance: Complete protein from eggs supports muscle building, B-vitamins support brain function, and healthy fats aid nutrient absorption.
breakfast_006.cooking_method: Sauté vegetables, add beaten eggs, scramble until cooked, serve with toasted bread

lunch_001.title: Dal Tadka with Brown Rice
lunch_001.description: Yellow lentils tempered with cumin, mustard seeds, and curry leaves, served with fiber-rich brown rice. Significance: Complete protein when combined with rice, high in folate and iron, supports heart health and provides sustained energy.
lunch_001.cooking_method: Pressure cook dal and rice separately, prepare tempering, mix and serve

lunch_002.title: Chicken Curry with Quinoa
lunch_002.description: Lean chicken cooked in aromatic Indian spices with tomato-onion gravy, served with protein-rich quinoa. Significance: High-quality complete protein supports muscle building, quinoa provides all essential amino acids, and spices offer anti-inflammatory benefits.
lunch_002.cooking_method: Marinate chicken, cook quinoa, prepare curry base, simmer chicken until tender

lunch_003.title: Rajma Masala with Jeera Rice
lunch_003.description: Kidney beans cooked in rich tomato-onion gravy with aromatic spices, served with cumin-flavored rice. Significance: Excellent source of plant protein and fiber, helps regulate blood sugar, supports heart health and digestive wellness.
lunch_003.cooking_method: Soak beans overnight, pressure cook, prepare masala base, simmer together

lunch_004.title: Fish Curry with Coconut Rice
lunch_004.description: Fresh fish cooked in coconut milk with South Indian spices, served with aromatic coconut rice. Significance: Rich in omega-3 fatty acids for brain and heart health, coconut provides healthy MCTs for sustained energy and metabolism boost.
lunch_004.cooking_method: Marinate fish, prepare coconut rice, cook curry with coconut milk and spices

lunch_005.title: Palak Paneer with Millet Roti
lunch_005.description: Cottage cheese cubes in creamy spinach gravy, served with nutrient-dense millet flatbread. Significance: High in iron, calcium, and protein, supports bone health and prevents anemia, millet provides sustained energy and is gluten-free.
lunch_005.cooking_method: Blanch spinach, prepare paneer, make millet dough, cook curry and rotis

lunch_006.title: Mixed Vegetable Sambar with Brown Rice
lunch_006.description: South Indian lentil curry with mixed vegetables and tamarind, served with brown rice. Significance: Complete nutrition with protein from lentils, vitamins from vegetables, and fiber from brown rice, supports digestive health and provides sustained energy.
lunch_006.cooking_method: Cook dal and rice, prepare vegetables, make tamarind extract, combine and simmer

dinner_001.title: Grilled Tandoori Chicken with Salad
dinner_001.description: Marinated chicken grilled to perfection with yogurt and spices, served with fresh cucumber-tomato salad. Significance: High-quality lean protein supports muscle recovery, probiotics from yogurt aid digestion, and fresh vegetables provide antioxidants.
dinner_001.cooking_method: Marinate chicken, grill until cooked, prepare fresh salad, serve together

dinner_002.title: Vegetable Khichdi with Ghee
dinner_002.description: Comfort food made with rice, lentils, and vegetables, topped with clarified butter. Easy to digest and nutritious. Significance: Perfect balance of carbs and protein, easy on digestion, ghee provides healthy fats and fat-soluble vitamins.
dinner_002.cooking_method: Wash rice and dal, add vegetables and spices, pressure cook, temper with ghee

dinner_003.title: Paneer Tikka with Mint Chutney
dinner_003.description: Grilled cottage cheese cubes marinated in yogurt and spices, served with fresh mint chutney. Significance: High in protein and calcium, supports bone health and muscle building, mint aids digestion and provides cooling effect.
dinner_003.cooking_method: Marinate paneer cubes, grill until golden, prepare mint chutney, serve hot

dinner_004.title: Mutton Curry with Cauliflower Rice
dinner_004.description: Tender mutton cooked in aromatic spices, served with low-carb cauliflower rice. Significance: Rich in iron, zinc, and B-vitamins, supports muscle building and energy metabolism, cauliflower rice reduces carb intake while providing fiber.
dinner_004.cooking_method: Pressure cook mutton with spices, rice cauliflower, sauté until tender

dinner_005.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers with Quinoa
dinner_005.description: Colorful bell peppers stuffed with spiced quinoa, vegetables, and paneer. Significance: Rich in vitamin C and antioxidants from peppers, complete protein from quinoa, supports immune function and provides sustained energy.
dinner_005.cooking_method: Hollow peppers, cook quinoa stuffing, fill peppers, bake until tender

dinner_006.title: Lentil Soup with Whole Grain Bread
dinner_006.description: Hearty mixed lentil soup with vegetables and Indian spices, served with fiber-rich whole grain bread. Significance: High in plant protein and fiber, supports digestive health, provides sustained energy and helps maintain stable blood sugar.
dinner_006.cooking_method: Sauté vegetables, add lentils and spices, simmer until creamy, serve with bread

snack_001.title: Roasted Chickpea Chaat
snack_001.description: Crunchy roasted chickpeas mixed with onions, tomatoes, and tangy spices. Significance: High in plant protein and fiber, supports digestive health and provides sustained energy between meals.
snack_001.cooking_method: Roast chickpeas, mix with chopped vegetables and spices

snack_002.title: Protein-Rich Smoothie Bowl
snack_002.description: Thick smoothie made with Greek yogurt, fruits, and nuts, topped with seeds and berries. Significance: High in protein and probiotics, supports muscle recovery and digestive health, provides antioxidants and healthy fats.
snack_002.cooking_method: Blend ingredients, pour in bowl, add toppings
